title: Electoral incumbent advantage for House members

content.question: All of the following are reasons incumbents in the House of Representatives enjoy an electoral advantage over challengers EXCEPT that incumbents

choices.label: get substantial financial support from their party's national committee
are better known to voters than are challengers
find it much easier to raise campaign funds than do challengers
can use staff members to do constituent service
often serve on committees that enable them to help the constituency

content.answer: get substantial financial support from their party's national committee

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
